column4: Not at the moment. We're trying to get that in as a console option before the 4.2 release.
We added in the compositor after the translation lock
So no UI config tools. :/
are you one of the XFCE devels?
Not officially, I'm on the dev lists though. :P

xfce is fast
XFCE is the best :D
It's the middleground between full desktop and simple window manager.

its just so handy

heh, i love xfce but not partial to gtk :)
